website_summaries.verdict: A simple solution for small terrariums, as Eco Carpets are perfectly sized for 10 gallon containers. These little green liners are great at absorbing waste, inexpensive, and provide a comfortable place for your reptiles to rest.
cons: It would be nice if these petite Eco Carpets were available in alternate colors

customer_reviews.title: Great substrate for ball python
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my new ball python. Was using paper towels which just looked sloppy. This is MUCH better. It is very easy to wash and doesn't stink at all. I just spray it off in the shower and wash with mild soap. Then I spray some zoo med wipe out and let it air dry. Get 2 so when you are cleaning one, you can put the other in the cage
customer_reviews.author: KrisT

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Reptile Toes Safe
customer_reviews.text: We use this in a 10 gallon cage for an anole that we found outside this past fall. My husband and I love how easy this is to clean, so far the anole still has all of his toes. It works great for both us and the lizard. I highly recommend buying this eco carpet, it is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Athena2419

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Functional
customer_reviews.text: My disabled gecko loves this mat and I bet your reptile will too!
customer_reviews.author: LJA

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: About an inch too long but otherwise works great once it flattens out
customer_reviews.author: Campbell834

customer_reviews.title: Snake tank
customer_reviews.text: This product is great when making the humditiy get up.
customer_reviews.author: Whitlep

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend it for box turtles they make a mess with it they kept punching it up
customer_reviews.author: bonetta k.

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do..price is ok
customer_reviews.author: Rose Takacs

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Shrink just washing out and air drying
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. Shrink just washing out and air drying. Now doesn’t fit tank correctly and crickets go underneath the material. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: redaiv

customer_reviews.title: Works & Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for our 10 gallon tank for our baby bearded dragon. The carpet covers the entire base of the tank perfectly. The product is easy to clean and reuse and holds up very nicely. I will only be buying Zoo Med carpets in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkalyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This carpet fit our ten gallon tank perfectly. We have a young gecko and it is great for his tank. It looks very nice. It is simple to remove for cleaning, and I recommend having two to make cleaning even easier- no need to wait for the carpet to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Hamele

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I liked it have leopard geckos so it does the job
customer_reviews.author: somaya

customer_reviews.title: Carpet for tank
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a leopard gecko and it serves its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Neraie Jones

customer_reviews.title: I like this product a lot better than the coco coir ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot better than the coco coir substrate or sand. Easy to clean, keeps the feeder critters from hiding, and poop is easy to clean. Did I mention easy to clean?
customer_reviews.author: Paul W. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great and efficient way to keep your reptiles home nice and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Sunbeam2000

customer_reviews.title: Was Legit
customer_reviews.text: My reptile loves the carpet. I have a leopard gecko & its easy to clean. Came in on time & package was not damaged at all.
customer_reviews.author: Evelia Mora

customer_reviews.title: Stretched and warped
customer_reviews.text: It was stretched and warped, I had to cut it to fit properly in the terrarium.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recommend for lizards who do not have nails. Cut to fit tank and works well.
customer_reviews.author: gracilacy

customer_reviews.title: Green, soft, awesome for my happy gecko
customer_reviews.text: This carpet is soft, easy to lay out, and fits great in my tank. My little gecko's claws don't get stuck in it like some other reptile carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Bien

customer_reviews.title: Really good.
customer_reviews.text: Little bit of a pain to clean but it's really nice, and a pretty look for your tank, I do wish there was other colors though :(
customer_reviews.author: Damian Cole

customer_reviews.title: works great in turtle tank.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I was expecting but for the price I got two and will just cut them to fit. bananas.
customer_reviews.author: socwrkgrl

customer_reviews.title: Nice, But difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my leopard gecko and a small amount of calcium got stained on it, I've been using ecoearth coconut fibers and it works amazing. but if you're careful I think this is a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: BrendaBlis

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for reptiles that eat/hunt live bugs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our juvenile leopard gecko and his teeth kept getting stuck on it when he ate his crickets. It is awful and we had to take it out immediately. Poor thing was stuck to the carpet multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is totally awesome!! It fits SO perfect, and it looks SO good, and I really recommend it!!!! file:///C:/Users/Tom/Downloads/IMG_1670(1).JPG
customer_reviews.author: hope

customer_reviews.title: Only for sick animals
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. In the wild your pet would not have carpet. depending on the pet you should put different bedding. For a desert reptile try sand and for a tropical use bark. I only recommend this if you have a sick pet. It will make it easier to catch food but still not a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

product_meta.title: Zoo Med Eco Carpet for 10 Gallon Tanks
product_meta.description: SOFT: Absorbent, non-abrasive carpet for many species of snakes, lizards, tortoises and insects. SAFE: Cannot be accidentally ingested by your animals.
